text: Na uppathena gacchantī pathena gacchantassa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā
edit: Na uppathena gacchantī pathena gacchantassa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā

translations.transtext: 72. Walking beside a path, I will not teach Dhamma to a person walking on the path who is not ill: a training to be observed.
